title: Bolognese Sauce
ingredients: 1 largish onion chopped not too fine
2 cloves garlic, chopped not too fine
1 long red sweet pepper, chopped not too fine
2 teaspoons of dried thyme (or equivalent fresh)
Fresh ground black pepper and salt
directions: Add in garlic cloves and cook
Add in minced meat and cook until done
add in the rest of the ingredients and cook until done
notes: One of the easiest dishes to make quickly
Add in a tablespoon of mango chutney if so desired
